### Education  {-}
 
These maps show the **share of the adults who's highest education attainment is less than a bachelor degree** for each census tract in Seattle CCD.

The data reflects a sample observed over a five-year span between 2011 and 2015.

<br>
```{r vuln-lt-bach-seaccd-map}

make_acs_crosstalk(long_sf = map_acs_data_sf,
             .geog = 'tract',
             .category = 'VULN',
             .topic = 'B15002',
             .pal = 'plasma',
             .pal_type = 'quantile',
             .legend_title = "LOW ED. ADULTS<hr>2011-2015",
             .height_lflt = 600,
             .height_pltly_upper = 200,
             .height_pltly_lower = 400,
             .width_pltly = 400,
             .plotly_title = 'LOW ED. ADULTS',
             zoom = 9)
```
